pages.text: It's not just your bags under your eyes that are evidence of a lack of sleep. There are also those creatures that come haunt you straight out of your missed nightmares when you don't regularly lie down to sleep - almost like they feel cheated when you avoid them by skipping sleep.$(br)Now this trinket is the physical equivalent of relaxation, no sleep necessary. After just a few minutes of wearing it, you feel physically and mentally fit again.$(li)$(br)Prevents spawning of Phantoms$(li)$(br)Reduces duration of negative effects$(li)$(br)Sleeping fully heals & removes all negative potion effects
